opis: Na prodaju prekrasna kuća u Primorsko-goranskoj županiji, točnije na prekrasnom otoku Krku (Malinska). Sama kuća je izgrađena kao slobodnostojeća i iznosi 1025 m2. Namjena kuće je stambeno poslovna i sastoji se od 5 stambenih jedinica: - suteren I- u naravi restoran - suteren II- dva velika apartmana - prizemlje- apartman - kat- dva apartmana - potkrovlje- dva apartmana Ukupno 7 apartmana i poslovni prostor. Cijeli suteren I. je osmišljen kao poslovni prostor, odnosno restoran te je samim tim tako i uređen. Svaki od apartmana ima svoje parkirno mjesto, prostrane terase  sa kojih imamo prekrasan pogled na more, zaseban ulaz u svaku stambenu jedinicu, zasebna brojila, pristup liftom. Lokacija nekretnine je idealna: - 50 m od tržnice i ribarnice -100 m od centra - 250 m od plaže (pijesak, šljunak) - 50 m najbliža trgovina, 100 m super market - u području centra cca 40 kafića i 40 restorana - 100 m marina - 200 m pošta - 150 m banka, 80 m bankomat - Frizerski salon, sauna, masaža 150 m - 100 m crkva - Zračna luka 15 km - Autobusna stanica 200m - Udaljenost od ZG (1:30h vožnje automobilom) Zabava uključuje: - Club Boa - 4 cocktail bara - Ribarske večeri, Malinskarske noći, Rock am Meer fest, Polinarova - Kulturni događaji - Jedriličarki klub - Streljački klub Znamo da je Krk turistički posjećeno mjesto i da nudi bezbroj mogućnosti, obzirom na izuzetnu lokaciju, nekretnina je idealna za provođenje kvalitetnog odmora, kao i za turistički najam sa garancijom popunjenosti kapaciteta. Ili prenamjenu jer daje jako puno mogućnosti. Početna cijena nekretnine 2.120,000,000 €. Dodatne informacije: Global Property d.o.o. 097 777 0589 croatiaglobalproperty@gmail.com A beautiful house for sale in the Primorje-Gorski Kotar County, more precisely on the beautiful island of Krk (Malinska). The house itself was built as a detached house and is 1025 m2. The purpose of the house is residential and commercial and consists of 5 residential units: - basement and - in nature a restaurant - basement II - two large apartments - ground floor - apartment - floor - two apartments - attic - two apartments A total of 7 apartments and office space. The entire basement I. was designed as a business space, that is, a restaurant, and is therefore decorated accordingly. Each of the apartments has its own parking space, spacious terraces from which we have a beautiful view of the sea, separate entrance to each residential unit, separate meters, elevator access. The location of the property is ideal: - 50 m from the market and fish market -100 m from the center - 250 m from the beach (sand, gravel) - 50 m to the nearest store, 100 m to a super market - in the area of the center, approximately 40 cafes and 40 restaurants - 100 m marina - 200 m post office - 150 m bank, 80 m ATM - Hair salon, sauna, massage 150 m - 100 m church - Airport 15 km - Bus stop 200m - Distance from ZG (1:30 hour drive) Entertainment includes: - Club Boa - 4 cocktail bars - Fishing evenings, Malinskar nights, Rock am Meer fest, Polinarova - Cultural events - Sailing club - Shooting club We know that Krk is a tourist-visited place and that it offers countless possibilities, given its exceptional location, the property is ideal for spending a quality vacation, as well as for tourist rental with a guarantee of occupancy. Or conversion because it gives a lot of possibilities. Initial price of the property €2,120,000,000/€. Additional information: Global Property d.o.o. 097 777 0589 croatiaglobalproperty@gmail.com
